name: Brake Authority Avid Juicy 3/5/7, Ultimate & BB7 Burly Brake
categories: Avid Juicy 3/5/7, Ultimate& BB7 Burly Brake
description: Brake Authority's Burly compound is designed for all-mountain and enduro riding and lasts a remarkably long time.For Avid® Juicy 3/4/5, Ultimate, and BB7 disc brake systems.Easy to control for progressive braking power.Ready to ride.
